```{r}
library(caret)

set.seed(123)

trainIndex = createDataPartition(all_data$scored, p = 0.8, list = F)
train = all_data[trainIndex, ]
test = all_data[-trainIndex, ]

model = train(scored ~HomeAway,
              data = train,
              method = "glm",
              family = "binomial")




pred_probs = predict(model, newdata = test, type = "raw")
pred_labels = predict(model, newdata = test)
```
